events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and I would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The product isn't what I paid for.
The customer's issue has been categorized under 'Refund' due to mention of requesting money back for incorrect product.
Support agent Julia has been assigned to handle the refund request for the incorrect item received by the customer.
Hello! I'm Julia from customer support. I'm sorry for the inconvenience. Let's get this refund process started for you.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the incorrect item you received to verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 45892X and I have attached a photo showing the item I received, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will issue a full refund within 3-5 business days once we receive the returned item. I will also send you a prepaid return label.
That sounds great! I appreciate your quick response and the prepaid label makes returning easier. Thank you!
The returned item has been received and your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount credited to your account shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since there has been no further response, we are closing the case. Thank you for contacting our support team, and have a great day!
